title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: This chart shows the number of Minutes that different Age Group Social Media Daily Spent .
The most Time Spent Social of Media Daily are the 45 - 54 Age Group , with approx 150 Minutes .
We can see form the chart that the next most Time Spent Social are the 15 - 24 year olds , spending approximately 125 Minutes on Media Daily Spent .
gold: In Maputo persons of 45 - 54 spend around 150 minutes daily on social media , more than any other age group . Next are 15 - 24 with 125 minutes , followed by 55 - 64 with 110 minutes . 25 - 34 spend 75 minutes , about the same as 35 - 44 .
